channel.title: Posts on Duong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Duong's Blog

item.title: First Post
item.description: 1. Who am I? Greetings to all. I’m Duong, a student at Vietnam National University’s University of Information Technology. I am interested in learning programming as well as many other subjects, including philosophy, football,… I have a strong preference for backend development, which will be my primary area of employment. 2. What is this website? Every day, I’m going to learn something new. I made this website in an effort to better my writing abilities and to help me remember the information I learnt for a longer period of time.
